summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5875 for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77376, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
